items.sentence: Tom showed Mary the letter that he got from John.
Tom ran into the house to get something to drink.
Tom has seriously been thinking about doing that.
Tom has decided not to go to Boston next weekend.
Tom has already left to meet Mary at the airport.
Tom has already decided to go Boston next summer.
Tom doesn't know anything about raising chickens.
Tom and Mary will be having a yard sale tomorrow.
Tom and Mary named their children John and Alice.
I suspect Tom went to Boston last week with Mary.
